column4: i have downloaded the Eclipse C/C++ package in http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/moreinfo/c.php, but i can't find any documentation or installation instructions to be integrated with my Eclipse ide already installed on a Ubuntu 9.04; is there anything important that i'm missing right now?
i don't want to be running eclipse from the zip file that i have extracted
why didn't you install from the repository? sudo apt-get install eclipse eclipse-cdt
didn't know c/c++ development environment is in the eclipse-cdt package
